hero.title: Access your Google Drive library in Kodi
hero.description: Connect your Google Drive account with Kodi and enjoy your multimedia content hassle-free.

items.title: Secure access
items.description: Log in securely with OAuth 2.0 to connect your Google Drive account.

items.title: Cloud library
items.description: Access all your multimedia files stored in Google Drive directly from Kodi.

items.title: Seamless integration
items.description: Enjoy a smooth experience while browsing and playing your content in Kodi.

howItWorks.title: How it works
list: Log in with your Google account on this web page.
Authorize access to your Google Drive.
Configure the Kodi add-on with the provided credentials.
Done! Now you can access your Google Drive content in Kodi.

alert.title: Authentication completed
alert.description: You have successfully logged into your Google Drive account.

accessInfo.title: Access Information
accessInfo.description: Use this information to configure the Kodi add-on

nextSteps.title: Next Steps
nextSteps.description: Follow these instructions to complete the setup in Kodi
steps: Go to "Add-ons" and select "Install from repository"
Find and select the "Google Drive for Kodi" add-on
In the add-on settings, enter the access token and refresh token
Save the settings and restart Kodi if necessary
